work.company: Drexel University, College of Computing and Informatics
work.title: Course Assistant
work.description: Course Assistant for Introduction to Computer Science (CS - 164)

work.title: Web and Mobile App Developer co-op
work.description: Used React Native, Python, Material UI and Unity Engine for the Frontend of the mobile app and also used Geo-location to show the closest charging points near the user, which can be customized based on the user’s preferences. Made a software that displays navigations on the user’s helmet, using Unity Engine and HUD technology to display directions from the user’s app

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Worked in a team to develop full stack web/mobile app in React.js, Python and MongoDB framework that serves 25000+ customers a month by helping them book services/products and also implemented Stripe CLI for payments and assisted new interns with React.js, React Native and WordPress and helped deliver projects on time
